page.title: 02FARMING
page.content:
Farming is the economic priority of this area. The low rolling hills of the Mourne foothills receive considerable amounts of rainfall for three-quarters of the year (N.B.- 1985 has been one of the wettest summers here this century!). Together, the landscape and rainfall levels limit the range of farming practiced to either pastoral sheep and cattle rearing (beef or dairy) or, mixed crop/pastoral farming growing grass with potatoes.
